attributes.action: Switch Prison Sentences from running Concurrently to running Consecutiively.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present if a convicted criminal is given two prison sentences, they run concurrently, meaning that, in effect, they only serve one prison sentence. I would like to see all Prison Sentences run consecutively, i.e, one after the other, so that BOTH Sentences are served.

rejection.details: A similar statement already exists, please see: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/endconcurrent
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
